sentences.en: Some English sentences are superficially negative but they actually connote affirmative, which often confuses translators.
sentences.cn: 英语里有些否定句表达的却是肯定之意, 从而造成了汉译中的“是非”误区.

sentences.en: Some grammatical rules of English connote much pragmatic information.
sentences.cn: 摘要英语语法规则中蕴含丰富的语用信息.

sentences.en: The term " program " is not intended to connote complete rigidity.
sentences.cn: “ 程序 ” 这个词不含有完全定型的意思.

sentences.en: The term "organization" often connotes a sense of neatness.
sentences.cn: “组织”这个词常常给人一种整洁的感觉。

sentences.en: The word " food " may connote " greed ".
sentences.cn: “ food ” 这个词可以含有 “ 贪婪 ” 的意思.

words.tran_cn: 内涵；含蓄；暗示，隐含意义；储蓄的东西（词、语等）

trans.tran_en: If a word or name connotes something, it makes you think of a particular idea or quality
